Title: Creates the jury duty mileage reimbursement tax credit
Summary: Establishes the jury duty mileage reimbursement tax credit; allows a juror a credit equal to their reasonable mileage allowance owed for each mile actually and necessarily traveled by such juror who utilizes their personal vehicle in the fulfillment of their jury duty.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to enacting the jury duty mileage reimbursement tax credit
